email_chain.subject: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body:
Hi John,

I hope this email finds you well. I’m reaching out regarding your inquiry for a crude oil shipment from Houston to Rotterdam. We have a suitable vessel, the MV Ocean Star, available for this route. She’s a modern Aframax with a DWT of 120,000 and an LOA of 250 meters.

Our starting freight quote is in the low 50s, say $50.75 per metric ton. Laycan is 15-20 October. Let me know your thoughts.

Best regards,
Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body:
Hi Sarah,

Thanks for the quick response. The vessel details look good, but the freight rate is a bit on the higher side. Would you consider $49.50 per metric ton? Also, can we confirm the laycan as 15-20 October?

Looking forward to your reply.

Best,
John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body:
Hi John,

Thanks for your feedback. I’ve discussed with the owner, and we can offer $50.00 per metric ton, which is a fair compromise. The laycan remains 15-20 October. Let me know if this works for you.

Best regards,
Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body:
Hi Sarah,

$50.00 per metric ton sounds reasonable. Let’s proceed with that. Can you confirm the demurrage rate? Also, please send over the full charter party agreement for review.

Best,
John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body:
Hi John,

Great! The demurrage rate is $20,000 per day, pro rata. I’ll send over the charter party agreement shortly for your review. Let me know if you need any clarifications.

Best regards,
Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body:
Hi Sarah,

Thanks for the details. I’ve reviewed the charter party agreement, and everything looks in order. Let’s finalize the deal. Please confirm the laycan once more, and we’ll proceed with the fixture.

Best,
John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body:
Hi John,

Perfect! The laycan is confirmed as 15-20 October. I’ll send over the final fixture recap shortly. Thanks for your cooperation, and looking forward to working with you on this shipment.

Best regards,
Sarah
